mainpage.title: Gentoo - Error 410
mainpage.abstract: The requested page has been removed.

body.p: Larry has eaten the page you were looking for. It is therefore no longer available. If you were directed to this error page from a link on one of our sites please email us so we can correct it.
body.note: The original cow's head graphic, known as "Larry the Cow" within the Gentoo community, was created by Ethan Dunham of Fonthead Design Inc. and is licenced under the CC BY-SA 2.5 licence.
